name: Marimba VR (itch)
description:
Behold, the power of music! I've always wanted a VR instrument, and without fingers, the options are pretty limited. Drumkits look boring to code, so here's a marimba in all it's glory.

Only tested on the HTC Vive, but should work on Oculus + Touch.

As a bonus, there's some extra notes at the back that you can use to select what notes are coloured, so it's easy to play on an specific scale.

Grip buttons to move the marimba one scale up or down.

Sound recommended (duh).
